nodes.text: Baltor Yfridian was a male Human, who served in the Thaereian military during the Clone Wars.

Yfridian held the rank of Captain and commanded the CR90 corvette Vigilant. He was assigned to carry out patrols in the Cularin system and during the time of the Clone Wars, attacked a group of pirates near to the planet Genarius. He later participated in the Battle of Cularin.
Yfridian was wise and would act graciously towards those who had assisted him. He had respect for the Jedi, but despised the Cularin Militia.
